products.title: detangling nectar packette
products.body_html: Our #1 bestselling Detangling Nectar glazes curls to ease combing through knots & coils seeking their independence. This slippy formula is crafted from Sea Moss, Aloe Vera & Grapeseed Oil to leave hair with shine & hydration. This detangler prepares strands for smooth, defined curls.

products.body_html:

Features the Hydration Shampoo that cleanses & nourishes strands without stripping them. Then, our Palo Santo Medium Conditioner, featuring a creamy blend of Jojoba, Olive & Avocado oils, leaves curls nourished & defined yet not weighed down.

Our bestselling Hydration Shampoo keeps hair hydrated & clean with a luxurious lather. Glaze strands with Detangling Nectar to separate strands while raking through coils with the Shower Brush for a defined Pattern. Perfect for every hair type. Includes a free large zipper pouch that is chic enough to use as a clutch or carry in a tote bag.

products.title: Tortoise Tool Kit with Pick
products.body_html:
Contains: Tortoise Edge Tool, Tortoise Wide Tooth Comb, Tortoise Hair Pick & Tortoise Zip Pouch

Chic enough to carry as a clutch, this Tortoise Tool Kit is a sophisticated set to style your strands. Our luxe Tortoise Wide Tooth Comb keeps strands tangle-free & our Tortoise Edge Tool keeps baby hairs sleek & slick. The glamorous duo comes in a matching zip pouch.

products.title: Heat Accessories Bundle
products.body_html: Streamline your heat styling routine with essential accessories like hair clips for precise sectioning, a dedicated tool bag for organization, and a protective diffuser cover to prolong attachment life. Our Luxe Beauty Carryall stores all your attachments & these accessories, adding both style and convenience to your on-the-go styling. These delightful Caramella hair goodies collectively enhance hairstyling process easier, efficient & enjoyable.

products.title: Juicy Curl Kit
products.body_html:
This Juicy Curl Kit is the perfect for cleansing & styling to ensure your natural curls are defined & nourished.

Includes Curl Mouse 8 fl oz, Leave-In Conditioner 9.8 fl oz, PATTERN Black Hair Clip, & bonus packettes of  our Cleansing Shampoo & Heavy Conditioner.

products.title: The Heat Bundle
products.body_html:
Use this Blow Dryer Set to explore the versatility of your texture while feeling confident & safe from heat damage. Our curl-concious Heat Bundle contains The PATTERN Blow Dryer (Beauty Award Winner) with four attachments to help shape, stretch, smooth & define your curls & coils. 

The PATTERN Blow Dryer -  features a professional-grade AC motor, a cool shot button, ion generator, & ceramic-coated grill to deliver voluminous styles & reduced dry time.  1875W and a voltage of 125V. Available for US & Canada only.

Heat Protectant - guards coily & curly hair from the often irreversible effects of heat damage

products.title: The Curling Iron & More Bundle
products.body_html:
When you're ready to explore your pattern & heat styling, try our Curling Iron Bundle, a comprehensive trio of tools crafted to empower you in experimenting with your hair's texture & sculpting your strands with heat.

Pattern Beauty Interchangeable Curling Iron has won the 2024 ELLE Tools and Treatment Award!

products.title: The Coily Starter Bundle
products.body_html:
10% off when you buy these products together as a bundle!

Includes: Hydration Shampoo, Heavy Conditioner, Curl Mousse, Wide Tooth Comb, Jojoba Oil Blend, Leave-In Conditioner (your choice of our original scent or new palo santo scent)

Coilies with tightly-packed corkscrew curls, rejoice. Finally, a bundle just for you that addresses all of your specific needs and will help you hydrate those springy strands and give extreme volume. From teeny-weeny afros to stretched twist outs, every coily style can be achieved with this bundle of nourishing hydrators and stylers that will unleash your best coils in your own bathroom. Because coily hair (4A) tends to be finer in texture & weight, you’ll want ingredients like Flaxseed Oil, Agave, Irish Moss & Chamomile plus specially crafted tools to stay soft, defined and resist tangles. Ready, set, go!

Formulated with 3B and 3C curlies in mind, these six must-haves infuse the moisture that is critical for maintaining curl definition and shine without unwanted frizz or weight. So to prevent breakage and care for delicate strands, infuse quality ingredients at every step of the journey. From the Hydration Shampoo to the Styling Cream, velvety coils will flourish thanks to Jojoba, Shea Butter, Cacay & Sweet Almond Oils. Wash Day will never be a burden thanks to the Wide Tooth Comb, Leave-In Conditioner and the Intensive Conditioner, which doubles as a mask. Looking to take your hair to new heights? Look no further.

products.title: Ultimate Hydration Bundle
products.body_html:
10% off when you buy these products has a bundle hydration treatment for hair!

Includes: Treatment Mask, Scalp Serum, Intensive Conditioner 13 fl oz, Wide Tooth Comb.

Infuse maximum moisture into your curly, tight textured or coily hair with a multi-step process that includes treating your scalp with our refreshing Scalp Serum infused with a blend of stimulating oils such as lavender, rosemary & peppermint, drenching each hair strand in our Treatment Mask inspired by ancestral rice water rinse traditions; then following up with hot oil treatment & an ultra-luscious conditioner. Ditch the dry hair while pampering your curly hair strands from root to tip.

products.title: Protective Style Set
products.body_html:
10% off when you buy these products together as a bundle!

Includes: Edge Control, Edge Tool, Scalp Serum, Deep Scalp Detox

Our Protective Style Set will equip you with everything you need to maintain a healthy scalp & laid baby hairs. Remember to give your scalp attention & care when wearing a protective style. Cleanse & lift impurities from the scalp with the Deep Scalp Detox. Then, apply our invigorating Scalp Serum to calm your scalp while in a protective style. This lightweight, non-greasy formula is infused with Peppermint, Rosemary, & Lavender oils which soothe & relieve tight styles.  Finish refreshing your style by styling your baby hairs with the Edge Duo.

  • Edge Control - style & smooth your edges
  • Edge Tool -  an edge brush and mini comb side for endless swoops & swirls 
  • Scalp Serum - a moisturizing Peppermint, Rosemary & Lavender Oil infused serum to soothe, cool & calm your roots
  • Deep Scalp Detox - a cleansing 2-in-1 solution: reset your scalp between wash days when wearing protective styles or use as a detoxifying pre-shampoo to restore scalp health

products.title: Palo Santo Favorites
products.body_html:
10% off when you buy these curl enhancing products together as a bundle

Includes: Palo Santo Leave-in Conditioner 9.8 oz, Palo Santo Curl Mousse 8 oz, Palo Santo Medium Conditioner 9.8 fl oz, Palo Santo Styling Cream 15 fl oz

Embark on a journey of caring for your coils & locks with our Palo Santo Favorites. Indulging in our popular Palo Santo scent, breathe in this light woody fragrance with notes of citrus & mint. Next, blanket your tresses in our Medium Conditioner, a creamy elixir that whispers softness into each strand. Seal in the moisture from your shower with our Palo Santo Leave-In Conditioner. With the Curl Mousse, your ringlets find their rhythm, a dance of definition & bounce. Finally, the Styling Cream, a jar of touchable yet firm sculpting magic for versatile styles. This bundle adds a romantic touch of warmth & tenderness to your haircare routine, a love letter to each & every strand.

products.title: Edge Control Duo
products.body_html:
Includes: Edge Control, Edge Tool 

Style, smooth & swirl your edges with our Edge Control Duo. Stronger hold & serious glide in the Edge Control helps you craft the perfect shape, protects from breakage & easily layers for reapplication the next day without flakiness. The dual Edge Tool gives you 3 tools in 1 for combing, brushing or swirling your short unruly baby hairs into whichever shape or smooth edge your heart desires.

products.body_html:
10% off when you buy these products together as a bundle for your shower routine!

The ultimate PATTERN set, our Deluxe Shower Bundle is everything you need to embrace your gorgeous & rock your pattern . Moisture-locking formulas & handy curl-caring tools will bring out your juiciest & most joyful hair.

products.title: Curl Revival Set
products.body_html:
10% off compared to buying individually - a $100 value!

Contains: Bounce Back Pre-Poo, Intensive Conditioner 13fl oz, Moisture Milk, Transition Mask 

When your textured hair strands need a pick-me-up after heat styling, turn to PATTERN’s Curl Revival Set, full of products to bring back curls to help nourish & fortify your natural hair. These four curl-restoring formulas will promote elasticity & leave your curl type bouncy & hydrated. Incorporate these curly hair products into wash days for longer-lasting moisture & body when restoring your natural curl pattern after heat styling.

  • Bounce Back Pre-Poo 10 fl oz - a revitalizing formula to add spring back to curly hair after heat styling
  • Intensive Conditioner 13 fl oz - the richest of PATTERN’s conditioner formulas packed with shea butter & oils to combat breakage & dryness
  • Moisture Milk 12 fl oz - a creamy formula that moisturizes thirsty strands with daily moisture
  • Transition Mask 11 fl oz - a nourishing mask to help reduce breakage & maintain moisture balance

Prepare your natural curl pattern by smoothing strands with our limited-edition Palo Santo Leave-In Conditioner to seal in hydration & caress curls with additional soft hold. Hydrating Mist revives coils days after your wash routine & protects them from environmental stressors with essential nutrients. Excellent for coily hair, curly hair & tight textured natural hair types.

*Excluded from sale

products.title: Styling Custard
products.body_html: Parents & kids rejoice! The lightweight & slippy Styling Custard makes hair care easier at every age. Scoop & lightly layer for hydrated hold, definition & extra shine for the entire family. Filled with Flaxseed Oil, Agave, Irish Moss & Chamomile, the custard is perfect for wet or dry ponytails, flat twists, braid-outs, twist-outs & bantu knots. Detangle curly, coily & tight textures hair as you style. Most popular among high-porosity curlies & coilies.

products.title: Transition Mask
products.body_html: Nourish your growing curls with our nutrient-dense Transition Mask. Infused with White Tea to help reduce shedding & Manuka Honey to help prevent breakage & maintain moisture balance, our formula is perfect for transitioning out of protective styles or chemically-treated curly hair to nourish the point where your natural & relaxed hair kisses. Ditching the relaxer, Keratin treatment, Brazilian straightening? This mask will help you support growth by retaining length.

products.title: Moisture Milk
products.body_html: Thirsty curls drink in lightweight hydration when you smooth our Moisture Milk through parched strands. Ideal for moisture that lasts all day, this creamy formula leaves strands shiny & supple. Rich Amla Oil, Irish Moss, & Agave Nectar soften curls & finesses unwanted frizz. Perfect for providing long lasting moisture & refreshing twist outs & wash-&-gos.

products.title: treatment mask
products.body_html: This curly hair mask was inspired by remedies passed down through generations. Our rice water protein-infused Treatment Mask is a modern take on hair care & treating your curls with something special. Luxurious in feel & powerful in performance, this mask delivers slip, curl elongation & definition to coils, providing moisture to dry or damaged hair & promoting hair growth. Formulated with softening & strengthening ingredients such as Rice Water Ferment & Moringa Seed Extract in a nod to ancestral, at-home remedies, your hair will be left hydrated, silky & pampered. No matter your curl pattern, this curly hair mask is the moisture treatment hair mask your natural hair strands have been looking for.

products.title: medium conditioner
products.body_html: Our Medium Conditioner is geared towards both coily & curly hair textures looking for hydration, slippage & curl definition. Your curls will dance to their own unique rhythm after conditioning. Featuring a hearty blend of Jojoba Oil & Olive Oil, our Medium Conditioner is great for keeping low to normal porosity curly hair nourished & defined yet not weighed down. Let your curls flourish.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: lightweight conditioner
products.body_html: Our silicone-free Lightweight Conditioner is geared towards naturals with fine or thin hair whose curls need a kiss of hydration. Great as a co-wash or for daily use after shampooing, our formula delivers weightless moisture to give hair a fresh start. Featuring Coconut Oil, Irish Moss & Biotin to soften & strengthen the hair, our creamy formula glides through your texture with the signature PATTERN slip to easily detangle while locking in hydration.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: Pick your Mini Bundle Promotional Details
Jetset Style Set
products.body_html:
Includes: Hydrating Mist 3 fl oz, Curl Gel 3 fl oz, Styling Cream 3 fl oz & Strong Hold Gel 3 oz

The Mini Stylers Bundle is the perfect little grouping to test & play with our latest formulas & get a sense for which stylers your pattern likes best. Deluxe-sized & ready for trial or travel, you'll receive all 4 formulas designed to define, hydrate & hold the beautiful plethora of hairstyles our textures can create from braids to bantu knots, wash-&-gos to locs.

Bonus: each tube & jar is refillable for eco-conscious curlies!

products.title: Retractable Comb.
products.body_html:
Our heat-resistant Retractable Comb features an isolated sectioning tooth at the top of the comb on one end & a sleek metal tail on the other, perfect for dual parting power to effortlessly create neat & even sections. The hide-and-seek slider with retract & lock technology is designed to shrink the comb to half its size, making this your new go-to accessory.

Pro Tip - use the isolated sectioning tooth to twist locs & remove braids.

products.title: Styling Cream Mini
products.body_html:
Lookin' like a jar of thick buttercream, our Styling Cream is the curly hair cream of your dreams. This styling cream for curly hair provides superior moisture penetration & the ideal oil-rich, touchable hold when setting a range of hair styles including twist outs, braid outs, bantu knots, wash-&-gos & more. Essential elements of ingredients such as Shea Butter, Cacay Oil Coconut Oil, Castor Oil & Sweet Almond Oil provide nourishing hair care to promote retention, while damaged hair caused by breakage. Say goodbye to unwanted frizz & hello to curl definition in all the versatile looks curly hair types can create. This curl cream styling product is also great for twisting locs! Let your natural hair shine with our hair styling cream whether your hair type is curly, coily or tight textured.

2022 Harper’s BAZAAR Hair Awards: The Best Products of the Year

products.title: Strong Hold Gel Mini
products.body_html: A flexible gel that provides long-lasting hold without breaking or drying hair & nourishes hair while creating a slick look. Infused with Sea Moss, Aloe Vera & Chia Seeds to nourish & fortify curls.

products.title: Medium Conditioner Mini
products.body_html: An award-winning moisture-rich conditioner infused with Jojoba Oil & Olive Oil is ideal for curly & coily hair textures looking for hydration, slippage & curl definition.

products.title: Lightweight Conditioner Mini
products.body_html: Ideal for fine or thin curly hair, this conditioner provides weightless moisture, helps with detangling & doubles as a co-wash. Infused with Coconut Oil, Irish Moss & Biotin to fortify strands while providing slippage.

products.title: Leave-In Conditioner Mini
products.body_html:
The holy grail of hair care products, our Leave-In Conditioner for curly hair treats your locks  with a refreshing & restorative hair pick-me-up with each ingredient. Prevent dry, unnecessary frizz & damaged hair & say hello to curl definition. When you’re done washing & want to seal in moisture or do further detangling, our lightweight formula is perfect to caress each curl & add extra hydration while giving soft curl pattern definition. Featuring a blend of key ingredients such as heavenly natural oils & honey, this leave-in hair conditioner for natural hair is also perfect to seal in moisture to your strands before putting hair into protective styles.

Whether your curl type is curly, coily hair, locs or have tight textured hair, it's essential to use the right hair styling products for your curly hair type. So, say goodbye to unwanted frizz, damage, or breakage, and say hello to healthy hair with the Leave-In Hair Conditioner.

Shop all of our bestsellers to pair with the Leave-In Conditioner, like our hair treatment masks to restore & elongate curls, shampoos & conditioners for every hair type & more.

Fragrance: Tracee picked this to be clean & not over-powering. Notes are a sweet floral essence of Neroli, Rose & Patchouli.

2020 Marie Claire Beauty Game Changer Award
2020 HelloGiggle’s Beauty Crush Award

products.title: Intensive Conditioner Mini
products.body_html: Rich, ultra-hydrating conditioner that protects against breakage, dryness & helps restore curl patterns. Packed with Avocado Oil, Shea Butter & Safflower Oil, this powerhouse doubles as a deep conditioner.

products.title: Hydration Shampoo Mini
products.body_html:
Add this hydrating shampoo for curly hair to your natural hair care routine. Creamy, luxurious & boosted with a blend of glorious oils, our Hydration Shampoo moisturizes dry hair, & helps curls & coils of every curl type dance in a wash of liquid sunshine. This gentle, moisturizing formula can softly lather to cleanse your hair & scalp, removing build-up & dirt without stripping away moisture. With our hydrating shampoo, we skip harsh surfactants such as SLS or SLES & bathe your curl pattern in a moisture-rich formula with nourishing ingredients like Shea Butter, Aloe Vera Leaf Juice, Coconut Oil & Honey. No matter your hair type - thick hair, fine hair, curly hair & damaged hair is left healthy & hydrated, get ready to be pampered by your favorite PATTERN hair products like our hydrating conditioner, our leave-in conditioner & more.

Fragrance: Tracee picked this to be clean & not over-powering. Notes are an exotic floral scent mélange of Jasmine, Bergamot & Sweet Sandalwood.

2022 InStyle Best Beauty Buy Winner
2020 Glamour Beauty Award Winner for Best Pro Shampoo for Curls
2020 NewBeauty Award Winner for Best Shampoo for Curls
2020 Woman's Health, Healthy Hair Award Winner
2019 Very Good Light, Lightening Award Winner
2019 Gloss Angeles’ Best Hair Launches

products.title: Hydrating Mist Mini
products.body_html:
Nectar of the gods, our Hydrating Hair Mist is a curl refresher spray that refreshes dry curls & reactivates them while protecting natural hair from environmental stressors. Crafted with Aloe Vera, Coconut Oil & Avocado Oil, the milky formula quenches thirsty curls with essential nutrients & additional moisture between each wash day and styling session.

Fragrance: Tracee picked this to be clean & not overpowering for your curly hair type. Notes of this product are a sweet floral essence of Neroli, Rose & Patchouli.

products.title: Heavy Conditioner Mini
products.body_html: Super rich & super thick conditioner that provides serious hydration for coils & tight textures. Avocado Oil, Shea Butter & Safflower Oil provide this formula with the signature “PATTERN slip” for easy detangling & great curl clumping.

products.title: Curl Mousse Mini
products.body_html:
Our ultra-light silicone-free Curl Mousse for natural hair delivers weightless volume & touchable hold for defined curls. This fluffy, one-step curly hair mousse formula dries quickly & defines to preserve natural curl (patterns 3B-4C) & set poppin’ styles. The foam-y hair mousse for curly hair is crafted from Marshmallow Root & Castor Oil to maintain moisture, softness & smoothness of your natural hair. The flake-free foaming mousse gives wash-&-gos, finger waves, finger coils & protective styles (such as braids) a voluminous shine. This styling product provides the ultimate curl definition & volume for your natural hair type (when applied to damp hair) without parabens or silicones.

Add our styling mousse to your hair care routine for definition & volume to enhance your natural curl type.

Fragrance: Tracee picked this to be clean & not over-powering. Notes are a sweet floral essence of Neroli, Rose & Patchouli.

2023 Good Housekeeping Best of Beauty Award Winner

products.title: Curl Gel Mini
products.body_html:
A favorite for applying to wet hair for wash-&-gos, the Curl Gel is a dream for defining your curl pattern, leaving you with bouncy & juicy curls with a medium hold. This curly hair gel is versatile, as you can achieve a slick, natural look when styling dry hair. The creamy, smooth formula of this curly hair gel glides on natural hair effortlessly & gives life to every coil & curly hair type with Aloe Vera, Coconut Oil & Cacay Oil as nourishing ingredients. Add this curl defining gel to your hair care routine for a flexible hold that supports styles that are defined, leaving hair, springy & touchable.

Fragrance: Tracee picked this to be clean & not overpowering. Notes are a sweet floral essence of Neroli, Rose & Patchouli.

products.title: Cleansing Shampoo Mini
products.body_html: Provides the deep cleaning benefits of clarifying shampoo without stripping away healthy oils. Our shampoo is boosted by antioxidant-rich Matcha Green Tea, Aloe Vera & Panthenol which promotes strong hair, removes buildup & revives scalps.

products.title: Palo Santo Leave-In Conditioner 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: <p>Our new Leave-In Conditioner features a limited-edition scent: an earthy &amp; bright aroma of Palo Santo to enhance your self-care routine. A sister to Tracee’s Holy Grail, the award-winning formula seals curls with a lasting moisture lotion packed with nutritious oils to combat dryness while also providing a soft hold for curl pattern definition. Hair is left hydrated &amp; you’re left ready to take on the world.<br></p><br data-mce-fragment="1"><p>Fragrance: A subtle woody fragrance with notes of Mint &amp; Citrus, evokes a deep sense of nostalgia &amp; self-care.</p>

products.title: Moisture Milk 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: Thirsty curls drink in lightweight hydration when you smooth our Moisture Milk through parched strands. Ideal for moisture that lasts all day, this creamy formula leaves strands shiny & supple. Rich Amla Oil, Irish Moss, & Agave Nectar soften curls & finesses unwanted frizz. Perfect for providing long lasting moisture & refreshing twist outs & wash-&-gos.

products.title: Leave-In Conditioner 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: Prevent dry, unnecessarily frizzy and damaged hair. The holy grail of hair care products, our Leave-In Conditioner treats your curls with a refreshing & restorative hair pick-me-up. When you’re done washing and want to seal in moisture or do further detangling, our lightweight formula is perfect to caress curls & add extra hydration while giving soft curl pattern definition. Featuring a blend of heavenly natural oils & honey, the Leave-In Conditioner for natural hair is also perfect to seal in moisture before putting hair into protective styles.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: intensive conditioner 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: Extra, extra, extra, this is our Intensive Conditioner, the richest of PATTERN’s ultra-hydrating conditioner formulas where tighter textures can seriously indulge. Perfect for low porosity hair struggling to get moisture to seep into strands, our powerful formula is packed with ingredients like Avocado Oil, Shea Butter, Safflower Oil & Acacia Decurrens Flower to help protect against breakage & dryness while leaving definition behind after rinse-out. This thick & creamy formula can be used either as a regular conditioner or a deep conditioner to restore your curl pattern.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: heavy conditioner 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: With a texture like butta, our Heavy Conditioner is perfect for coily & tight textures. Creamy, luscious & invigorating, our formula has coils singing in celebration as it wraps them in serious hydration & the signature “PATTERN slip” for easy detangling & great curl clumping. We boosted with ingredients like Avocado Oil, Shea Butter & Safflower Oil to keep our conditioner extra rich & nourishing for curly hair. Time to coat the strands in a sliver of heaven.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: detangling nectar 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: Our #1 bestselling Detangling Nectar glazes curls to ease combing through knots & coils seeking their independence. This slippy formula is crafted from Sea Moss, Aloe Vera & Grapeseed Oil to leave hair with shine & hydration. This detangler prepares strands for smooth, defined curls.

products.title: 2 Minis for $20
products.body_html:
Do not add this product to your cart. Please visit the bundle page to edit.

This is a dummy product and must not be deleted or altered.

Dummy products are essential for the Bundle Builder app to function.

Learn more here: https://support.bundlebuilder.app/hc/en-gb/articles/4409557939473-Dummy-products

products.title: lightweight conditioner 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: Our silicone-free Lightweight Conditioner is geared towards naturals with fine or thin hair whose curls need a kiss of hydration. Great as a co-wash or for daily use after shampooing, our formula delivers weightless moisture to give hair a fresh start. Featuring Coconut Oil, Irish Moss & Biotin to soften & strengthen the hair, our creamy formula glides through your texture with the signature PATTERN slip to easily detangle while locking in hydration.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: medium conditioner 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: Our Medium Conditioner is geared towards both coily & curly hair textures looking for hydration, slippage & curl definition. Your curls will dance to their own unique rhythm after conditioning. Featuring a hearty blend of Jojoba Oil & Olive Oil, our Medium Conditioner is great for keeping low to normal porosity curly hair nourished & defined yet not weighed down. Let your curls flourish.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: Retractable Comb
products.body_html: Perfect your style with our heat-resistant Retractable Comb, equipped with a sectioning tooth & sleek metal tail for dual parting. Its retract & lock technology conveniently shrinks the comb in half for easy storage & portability, ideal for on-the-go styling.

products.title: The Interchangeable Curling Iron
products.body_html:
Discover PATTERN’s first curl-conscious Interchangeable Curling Iron. Designed to empower, enhance & unleash the full potential of your curly hair type, this innovative styling tool has a swivel cord & boasts 3 tourmaline ceramic clip barrel size options for a personalized curling experience while minimizing damage.

Winner of the 2024 ELLE Tools and Treatment Award!
Winner of the 2024 Allure Best of Beauty Award!

*Price as marked

products.title: Sectioning Clips (4pcs)
products.body_html: Our hair Sectioning Clips are designed to keep your texture secure & fastened as you sleek & style your curly hair type. Crafted to be sturdy & grip while being smooth on natural hair, these modern, Caramella-colored hair clips for styling (also known as alligator hair clips) enhance your haircare & self-care experience.

products.title: Luxe Beauty Carryall
products.body_html: Our sleek & spacious Luxe Blow Dryer Carryall has six protective pockets to store your PATTERN Blow Dryer & all its attachments. This vegan leather 2-in-1 tote can be used for travel, has a hair dryer storage bag, or as a standing case to hold your personal care products, tools, or brushes while you style. (Simply fold down the sides of the Blow Dryer Bag!)

products.title: Diffuser Cover
products.body_html: Cover your Diffuser attachment to protect prongs when at home or on the go. Prevent dirt & grime from tarnishing your favorite wash-&-go attachment. Our elegant Diffuser Cover is designed to protect your tool & extend the lifetime of its quality.

products.title: Palo Santo Styling Cream
products.body_html:
Award-winning cream is now available in the earthy & bright aroma of Palo Santo to enhance your self-care routine. 
An oil-rich & super thick cream that provides superior moisture, & curl definition on coily & tightly textured hair. Formulated with Shea Butter, Cacay Oil & Sweet Almond Oil which help prevent breakage & damage.

products.title: Palo Santo Curl Mousse
products.body_html: Award-winning mousse is now available in the earthy & bright aroma of Palo Santo to enhance your self-care routine. Ultra-light mousse that defines curls, adds weightless volume & shine while maintaining softness & smoothness. Crafted from Marshmallow Root & Castor Oil this mousse is ideal for wash-&-gos, protective styles, finger-waves & more!

products.title: Palo Santo Medium Conditioner
products.body_html:
Bestseller that is now available in the earthy & bright aroma of Palo Santo to enhance your self-care routine. 

An award-winning moisture-rich conditioner infused with Jojoba Oil & Olive Oil is ideal for curly & coily hair textures looking for hydration, slippage & curl definition.

products.title: Palo Santo Leave-In Conditioner
products.body_html: #1 bestseller is now available in the earthy & bright aroma of Palo Santo to enhance your self-care routine.  Our leave-in conditioner seals in moisture & adds extra hydration to dry or damaged hair while providing soft curl definition & preventing unwanted frizz. Formulated with Aloe, Honey & Jojoba Oil, our leave-in is great for all hair textures & styles such as wash-n-go's, twist outs & protective styles.

products.title: Spoontula
products.body_html: Half spoon & half spatula, our Spoontula is perfect for getting out every last drop of your favorite formulas. From hair masks to your jumbo-sized Curl Gel, never leave a drop in your jar again.

products.title: Hair Pins Variety Pack
products.body_html:
When sturdy pins are needed to bring a look together, we’ve got you taken care of with the compact Hair Pins Variety Pack. Built to be the right lengths, strengths & textures for our voluminous hair, each pin is strong & crafted to last through many looks & hairstyles as it slips in gently between your strands. Purses & drawers stay clean with the help of a cute reusable case, and an army of pins remain ready to spring into action whenever a hairstyle needs a little support.

Includes 30 hair pins, 30 long hair pins & 30 matte bobby pins

products.title: Curly Hair Ties 5pcs
products.body_html:
Crafted to be super stretchy, extra durable & snag-free, your strands will be treated to the best with our Hair Ties. Super tight ponytails, snatchbacks, buns & puffs here we come!

Includes 5 hair ties & a reusable zip bag

products.title: Wash 'N' Go Kit
products.body_html:
10% off when you buy these in a bundle! 

Includes: Leave-In Conditioner 9.8 fl oz, Curl Gel 9.8 fl oz, & Hydration Shampoo 9.8 fl oz 

Our Wash N Go Kit features three of PATTERN's bestsellers all in one kit, perfect for curl definition, detangling, sealing in moisture & preventing unwanted frizz. PATTERN's Leave-In Conditioner is Tracee's Holy Grail, featuring a blend of oils, Biotin & Honey for hydration & soft hold. Our beloved Curl Gel is a dream for defined, bouncy, touchable & juicy curls looking for medium hold. It glides on effortlessly & gives life to coils with the nourishment of Aloe Vera, Coconut Oil & Cacay Oil. Our bestselling Hydration Shampoo is boosted with 10 nourishing oils. This creamy, gentle formula cleanses curls & scalps to remove buildup without stripping away moisture.  A perfect set for ponytails, puffs, wash & gos & touching up protective styles. Bathe your hair in these moisture-rich formulas packed with premium ingredients for juicy & joyful hair this season.

products.title: Limited Edition Tortoise Hair Pick
products.body_html: Elevate your strands & your style with our chic Tortoise Hair Pick. A stylish edition of our long-pronged Pick to shape, style, elongate & add volume to spirals, coils & curls.

products.title: Caramella Hair Clip
products.body_html:
Hair Clips for curly hair available in Black, "Caramella" & Tortoise

Our Luxe Hair Clip Trio includes three of our popular Claw Clip in 3 rich choices: black, "Caramella" & tortoise. Made of strong premium acetate, our Hair Clip is perfect for securing every tight texture, coily & curly hair type. Perfect for styling or holding tight textures & other curly hair types while detangling, these chic Hair Clips are the perfect, versatile hair accessory to add to your routine. The long-pronged & curved design is great for sectioning thick hair so you can lovingly tend to your curl pattern.

Pair our Claw Clips with other natural hair accessories such as a hair tie, bobby pin, barrettes, & satin or velvet scrunchies.

products.title: Bounce Back Pre-Poo
products.body_html: Spring coils back into action after heat styling or hair straightening treatments. This pre-poo nourishes strands with Murumuru Seed Butter & promotes elasticity & smooths frizz with Oat Extract & Hibiscus Flower Extract bringing more bounce to your curl’s ounce.

products.title: VIP Creator Exclusive of the Month
products.body_html:
Back to School, Classroom Chic: The Ultimate Haircare Kit!

Gear up for the new school year with PATTERN’s all-star lineup designed to keep your curls, coils & tight textures healthy, nourished & flourishing. The entire family will be picture-day ready every day!

Tame those morning tangles with our Detangling Nectar, a magical mix of Sea Moss, Aloe Vera, & Grapeseed Oil that makes combing through knots as easy as a pop quiz. For styling that turns heads, our Styling Cream, packed with Shea Butter, Cacay Oil & Sweet Almond Oil, delivers moisture & hold so you can rock twist outs, braid outs & wash-&-go’s with confidence, & slip into any effortless style with our Styling Custard—hydration & hold with a touch of magic for every twist & turn! Finish off with our Edge Control & Edge Tool for that perfect shape & extra shine—because even your edges deserve a little spotlight! Plus, our Double-Sided Bristle Brush polishes & refines, ensuring every strand is sleek and smooth.

With PATTERN, you’re not just ready for school—you & your family have all the tools you need to take on each & every moment.

Talking Points:

  • Highlight the ease of getting the family ready in the morning
  • Highlight being prepared for the requested style of day from the kiddos
  • Emphasize the ease of use with each product
  • Highlight that these products work on all hair types
  • Highlight that these products work on all hair types
  • How our products effectively work on your hair & the ones you love (aka, the littles)

products.title: cleansing shampoo 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: When it's time for a deep clean, our Cleansing Shampoo cleanses your natural hair to remove product buildup and residue, revives the scalp & gives hair a fresh start without stripping away the healthy, natural oils of your tresses. Our formula features antioxidant-rich Matcha Green Tea, Aloe Vera & Vitamin B5 (Panthenol) to promote strong hair. A deep clean can be especially helpful for low porosity hair types wanting to keep their cuticle open to receiving moisture to prevent dry hair and promote healthy hair care. Our Cleansing Shampoo is specifically formulated for curly hair types who have type 3 & type 4 curls to clear residue from the hair shaft while maintaining moisture.<br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: treatment mask 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: This curly hair mask was inspired by remedies passed down through generations. Our rice water protein-infused Treatment Mask is a modern take on hair care & treating your curls with something special. Luxurious in feel & powerful in performance, this mask delivers slip, curl elongation & definition to coils, providing moisture to dry or damaged hair & promoting hair growth. Formulated with softening & strengthening ingredients such as Rice Water Ferment & Moringa Seed Extract in a nod to ancestral, at-home remedies, your hair will be left hydrated, silky & pampered. No matter your curl pattern, this curly hair mask is the moisture treatment hair mask your natural hair strands have been looking for.

products.title: Deep Scalp Detox
products.body_html: Restore scalp health with a 2-in-1 serum crafted with Australian Tea Tree Oil, balancing Pink Clay & Lemon Peel Oil to purge dirt, dead skin & lingering product naturally. Ideal for a reset in between wash days, during or after braids, wigs & weaves.

products.title: curl gel 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: Our bestselling gel for wash-&-gos, the Curl Gel is a dream for defined, bouncy & juicy curls looking for medium hold. The creamy, smooth formula glides on effortlessly & gives life to coily and curly hair with the nourishment of Aloe Vera, Coconut Oil & Cacay Oil. Styles are defined, & hair is left flexible, springy & touchable. The finish is neither flaky nor drying.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: styling cream 1.75 fl oz
products.body_html: Lookin' like a jar of thick buttercream, our Styling Cream is the curly hair cream of your dreams. This curl defining cream provides superior moisture penetration & the ideal oil-rich, touchable hold for a range of curl types and setting hair styles including twist outs, braid outs, Bantu knots, wash-&-gos & more. Essential elements of Shea Butter, Cacay Oil & Sweet Almond Oil nourish the hair to promote hair retention while preventing breakage or damage. Say goodbye to frizz and hello to curl definition in all the versatile looks tight textures, coily & curly hair types can create. This curl cream styling product is also great for twisting locs!<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: Moisture Milk
products.body_html: Award-winning lightweight cream provides long-lasting moisture to dry hair, reduces breakage & keeps unwanted frizz at bay. Crafted with key ingredients like Rich Amla Oil, Irish Moss & Agave Nectar, Moisture Milk is perfect for providing daily moisture to curly hair & refreshing twist outs & wash-&-gos for the ultimate shine.

products.title: PATTERN x SERGIO HUDSON Curl-Conscious Robe
products.body_html:
Featuring plush & elegant waffle weave, our fashion-forward Curl-Conscious Robe blends Tracee's favorite article of clothing with fashion designer Sergio Hudson's powerfully stunning silhouettes. Made for after-shower use, deep conditioning, or to compliment those leisurely moments, you'll feel elegant from nape to knee in this white waffle robe.

  • Includes a PATTERN Beauty Robe Dust Bag

products.title: Scented Candle
products.body_html:
Infuse your space & senses with the PATTERN Scented Candle. Whether you’re spending a few precious moments in the oasis of your bathtub or setting the mood for some couch coziness, we’ve got the calming scent you need to make any spot a soothing, self-care experience. Formulated with our high-quality soy-blend wax to burn cleanly, our signature fragrance candle will keep those vibrations up & let your joy spread.

Fragrance Notes: This scent is meant to be clean & not overpowering. Notes are a sweet floral essence of Neroli, Rose & Patchouli.

products.title: Double-Sided Bristle Brush
products.body_html: Double-sided 2-in-1 tool that polishes flyways with soft nylon bristles on one side & slicks tighter styles with stiff boar bristles on the other.

products.title: Paddle Brush
products.body_html: Master any style with our Paddle Brush, equipped with heat-resistant, flexible bristles designed for effortless heat styling & detangling, leaving your hair perfectly finished & smooth.

products.title: Medium Conditioner
products.body_html: An award-winning moisture-rich conditioner infused with Jojoba Oil & Olive Oil is ideal for curly & coily hair textures looking for hydration, slippage & curl definition.

products.title: the wide tooth comb attachment
products.body_html: The Blow Dryer Comb Attachment mimics our Wide Tooth Comb, sporting smooth yet sturdy teeth gliding through wet or dry hair. The only difference is that the attachment can go on your blow dryer for ease of use when heat styling! This means you can channel hot air without heat damage while gently combing out kinks in your natural hair.

products.title: the brush attachment
products.body_html:
The PATTERN Hair Dryer Brush Attachment is made for heat styling without heat damage & is uniquely designed based on our definition-boosting Shower Brush, so the bristles are crafted with your curls in mind. 

The Brush Attachment can make your curly hair styling prep work easy. While the blow dryer works its heated magic, the attachment’s bristles start detangling, making it an ideal step to add between wash & style for every hair type.

Test out each different heat setting, utilize the cool shot technology & pair with our other attachments for the best results.

products.title: the diffuser attachment
products.body_html:
This curly hair dryer Diffuser Attachment was made to pair with the PATTERN Blow Dryer.

Attach this hair diffuser to your blow dryer to achieve volume & definition without heat damage. Our ventilated prongs help evenly distribute air from root to tip with a gentle gust of low heat by using the different settings that Tracee specifically designed with every curly hair type in mind.

For thick curly hair, air drying can take hours! Luckily, you don’t have to choose between frizz & wet hair. Our diffuser attachment has air flow that speeds up drying time without ruining your hairstyle or curl pattern.

Rolling out some finger waves? Tying some Bantu knots? This is the perfect attachment for styling that will help lock your hair in place all day.

products.title: the concentrator nozzle attachment
products.body_html:
Our Blow Dryer Concentrator Nozzle Attachment was made to pair with the PATTERN Hair Dryer.

Tracee created this attachment for every curly hair type to help prep curls for protective styles, style a blowout or add stunning length to other stretched styles without the heat damage. The nozzle helps you direct air flow & heat right where you need it.

If you’re using the Diffuser Attachment for setting curls, follow that step with the Concentrator Nozzle to add extra length. To minimize frizz when elongating curls, we suggest using the lowest speed & heat setting.

products.title: The PATTERN Blow Dryer
products.body_html: Experience the freedom & versatility of styling with our high-performing Blow Dryer designed for curly, coily & tight-textured hair. This award-winning hot tool includes 4 unique attachments to help shape, stretch, smooth, & define.  It is equipped with a powerful AC motor that reduces dry time, & an ion generator to smooth the cuticle.

products.title: Heat Protectant
products.body_html:
Shield your curls & coils from heat damage with our lightweight, silky Heat Protectant. Infused with nourishing ingredients, it adds a healthy luster for beautifully protected hair.

Size: 4 fl oz

products.title: Shine Spray
products.body_html:
Finish styles with our ultra-lightweight Shine Spray for curly hair to leave curls luminous & radiant. Formulated with key ingredients like Castor Oil & Plumeria Flower Extract, spritz to enhance luster while keeping curls soft after using styling products for the appearance of overall hair health. The non-greasy sheen is perfect for any hair type and even protects against humidity as it provides your crown with a nourishing glow. Add this hair shine spray to your curly hair care routine for a brilliant shine.

Size: 4.75 fl oz

products.title: Hair Care Is Self-Care Mug
products.body_html: Deep conditioning your curls now has the perfect complement — PATTERN’s Limited Edition Coffee Mug. Whether you’re enjoying herbal tea or spilling it with friends, grab our chic ceramic off white mug. After Tracee posted herself sipping during her wash-day routine, the PATTERN community spoke loud & clear: they wanted to add the ceramic mug to their homes. The 16 oz. self care mug features the PATTERN logo on one side & the Treatment Collection motto, “Hair care is self-care,” on the other. Sip your new favorite mug in style!

products.title: Route Package Protection
products.body_html:
Route provides protection for shipments that are lost, broken, or stolen. Add Route to your cart at checkout to enable protection.

Visit route.com to learn more.

products.title: Tortoise Tool Kit
products.body_html:
Contains: Tortoise Edge Tool, Tortoise Wide Tooth Comb & Tortoise Zip Pouch

Chic enough to carry as a clutch, this Tortoise Tool Kit is a sophisticated set to style your strands. Our luxe Tortoise Wide Tooth Comb keeps strands tangle-free & our Tortoise Edge Tool keeps baby hairs sleek & slick. The glamorous duo comes in a matching zip pouch.

products.title: Edge Control
products.body_html: Style & smooth edges with our long-lasting, healthy hold Edge Control. Formulated with Beeswax & Mango Seed Butter which helps improve condition, prevents breakage & will not cause flaking.

products.title: Wash Day Essentials
products.body_html:
A $40 value

Includes: 9.8 fl oz Leave-In Conditioner & 3 fl oz Hydration Shampoo

Hair products to help natural hair strands start fresh, our Wash Day Essentials kit contains two of our most loved formulas. Our Hydration Shampoo gently cleanses curls & coils without stripping strands. Tracee’s holy grail Leave-In Conditioner restores softness & suppleness. When combined during a wash day routine, curly hair is left nourished, bouncy & defined.

FRAGRANCE: Tracee picked this to be clean & not over-powering. Notes are a sweet floral essence of Neroli, Rose & Patchouli.

products.title: Detangling Nectar
products.body_html: #1 best detangler for curly hair glazes curls to loosen stubborn knots & tangles before wash day or styling your natural hair. Formulated with  Sea Moss, Aloe Vera & Grapeseed Oil that provide extra slip, moisture & shine. It's our community's favorite hair detangler for a reason!

products.title: Texture Travel Kit
products.body_html:
A $44 value

Includes: 3 oz Leave-In Conditioner, 3 oz. Intensive Conditioner, 3 oz. Cleansing Shampoo

For travel or trial, our Texture Travel Set includes minis of our Cleansing Shampoo, Intensive Conditioner, Leave-In Conditioner. Keep your hair fully clean & deeply hydrated no matter where you go.

Cleansing Shampoo: deep cleaning & removes build-up without stripping hair
Intensive Conditioner: rich & ultra-hydrating; doubles as a deep conditioner to protect against breakage & dryness
Leave-In Conditioner: seals curls to help combat dryness & enhance curl patterns

FRAGRANCE: Tracee picked this to be clean & not over-powering. Notes are a sweet floral essence of Neroli, Rose & Patchouli.

products.title: Curl Cocktail Kit
products.body_html:
Includes: 3 oz Leave-In Conditioner, 3 oz. Styling Cream, 3 oz. Mini Curl Gel

Our Curl Cocktail Kit is the perfect natural hair styling trio including three of our bestsellers: the Mini Leave-In Conditioner, Mini Styling Cream & Mini Curl Gel. Test these beloved curly hair products & enhance your natural curls on-the-go. Great for ponytails, puffs, wash-&-gos & touching up protective styles.

Leave-In Conditioner: seals curls to help combat dryness & enhance curl pattern during hair care routine
Styling Cream: for superior moisture & touchable hold on thin or thick hair
Curl Gel: defines & nourish curls with a medium hold — great for wash-&-gos & one of our favorite products to hold curls

FRAGRANCE: Tracee picked this to be clean & not over-powering. Notes are a sweet floral essence of Neroli, Rose & Patchouli.

products.title: Satin Scrunchies For Natural Hair (3pcs)
products.body_html: Silky smooth & XL in size, our Satin Scrunchies for curly hair are the hair ties your curls have been dreaming of. Crafted with high quality satin material for a gentle glide across delicate strands, each scrunchie also features an extra wide, super stretchy inner hair tie for strength & durability as you wrap your voluminous curl pattern. Great for night pineapples, beautiful buns, or the many gorgeous hairstyles your hair type can create.

products.title: Curl Mousse
products.body_html: Ultra-light mousse that defines curls, adds weightless volume & shine while maintaining softness & smoothness. Crafted from Marshmallow Root & Castor Oil this mousse is ideal for wash-&-gos, protective styles, finger-waves & more!

products.title: Mini Shower Brush
products.body_html: Compact & perfect for on-the-go styling, our mini hair brush is heavy-duty yet gentle on every curly hair type, even in its travel-friendly size. A secret tool for styling happy curls and massaging the scalp. The travel hair brush is built with premium features & a comfortable handle design. Detangling wet hair strands with the nylon bristles becomes effortless & curl patterns define with ease.

products.title: Transition Mask
products.body_html:
A nutrient-dense mask that prevents breakage & maintains moisture balance.
Infused with White Tea to help reduce shedding & Manuka Honey to help prevent breakage & maintain moisture balance. Great for those transitioning from protective styles, straightened hair, or chemical treatments back to their natural curls.

products.title: Juicy & Joyful Mug
products.body_html: Winter curl care now has the perfect complement — PATTERN’s Limited Edition Mug. Whether you’re snuggled with a partner or sipping hot cocoa solo, grab our chic black ceramic mug. The second limited-edition mug in the collection, we created this matte black vessel after the ivory version sold out in just 24 hours! The 16-ounce mug features the PATTERN logo on one side & the brand motto “Juicy & Joyful” on the other. Sip in style!

products.title: Styling Custard
products.body_html: A lightweight & slippy custard that provides a hydrated hold, definition, & shine that is perfect for ponytails, flat twists, braid-outs, twist-outs, bantu knots & more! Filled with Flaxseed Oil, Agave, Irish Moss & Chamomile to promote shinier & stronger hair.

products.title: Scalp Serum
products.body_html: Tingly, hydrating serum that soothes your roots & gives your scalp a sense of relief from tight protective styles such as braids. Formulated with Peppermint, Rosemary & Lavender oil which are known to moisturize scalps & stimulate your senses.

products.title: Treatment Mask
products.body_html: Softening & strengthening mask delivers slip, curl elongation & definition to coils while providing moisture to dry or damaged hair & promoting hair growth. Powerhouse ingredients like Rice Water Ferment & Moringa Seed Extract leave hair fortified & hydrated.

products.title: Lightweight Conditioner
products.body_html: Ideal for fine or thin curly hair, this conditioner provides weightless moisture, helps with detangling & doubles as a co-wash. Infused with Coconut Oil, Irish Moss & Biotin to fortify strands while providing slippage.

products.title: Gift Card
products.body_html:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of curl choice with a PATTERN gift card!

Gift cards are delivered by email & contain instructions on how to redeem them at checkout. Click ADD TO BAG to have the gift card emailed directly to your inbox, or select SEND AS GIFT to schedule the gift card’s email delivery to your curl friend.

PATTERN Gift cards have no additional processing fees.

products.title: Luxe Beauty Bag
products.body_html: This hair product travel bag is a large zipper pouch that is chic enough to use as a clutch or carry in a tote bag. Our Luxe Beauty Bag is the queen of storage for all your travel-size or full-size PATTERN products. Featuring a water-resistant lining with material that is easy to wipe clean should anything spill. A great option for travel if you have curly hair, giving you a ton of room to store all your hair care products, toiletries, cosmetics, hair accessories, or other beauty products while on an adventure.

products.title: Mini Wide Tooth Comb
products.body_html: Compact & perfect design for on-the-go hair styling, our mini comb works on wet or dry hair wherever you are away from home. Curls will shake, boogie & be free as hair glides with ease through wide-set teeth. This travel comb can help with curly hair tangles while also encouraging volume & separation when fluffing out dry hair. The perfect hair comb to add to your tool collection!

products.title: Hair Tools Kit
products.body_html:
40% off. A $42 value!

A bundle like no other, our Hair Tools Set brings together three powerhouse implements to assist in making gorgeous natural hair. As you move from gently detangling to clumping curls to picking out hair in gravity-defying grandeur, these hair care tools work hand in hand with our nourishing formulas for curly hair health & style.

products.title: Spray Bottle
products.body_html:
Because every curl friend needs one, introducing the PATTERN Mist Spray Bottle to infuse your hair type when a little extra moisture is needed to get the job done. Featuring the premium Flairosol airless technology, our curly hair spray bottle offers a beautiful, continuous mist with a prolonged spray. It can be used in all directions to hit tough-to-reach spots & angles to refresh curls.

The hair mist bottle is an aerosol-free sprayer, so no harmful propellant gases or pressurized containers will negatively affect our environment or health. Use to your strands content with water or homemade concoctions featuring your favorite PATTERN hair product. Bonus: refill bottle & reuse it for eco-conscious natural hair styling!

products.title: Wide Tooth Comb
products.body_html: Experience effortless detangling & enhanced volume with our Wide Tooth Comb. Designed with wide-set prongs, it smoothly navigates through wet hair & promotes natural volume & separation when fluffing out dry hair. Perfect for achieving your desired look with ease.

products.title: Styling Cream
products.body_html: An oil-rich & super thick cream that provides superior moisture, and curl definition on coily & tightly textured hair. Formulated with Shea Butter, Cacay Oil & Sweet Almond Oil which help prevent breakage & damage.

products.title: Strong Hold Gel
products.body_html: A flexible gel that provides long-lasting hold without breaking or drying hair & nourishes hair while creating a slick look. Infused with Sea Moss, Aloe Vera & Chia Seeds to nourish & fortify curls.

products.title: Hydrating Mist
products.body_html: Milky formula that refreshes, revitalizes & adds moisture to curls in between wash days. Crafted with Aloe Vera, Avocado & Coconut Oil this mist is great for daily use & can be cocktailed with other styling products.

products.title: Hair Pick
products.body_html:
Vibrations up! Lifting your crown to glorious heights, our Hair Pick for curly hair is function & flair all in one. Extra long prongs help to shape styles, add volume & elongate your kinks, coils & curls--especially perfect for reviving natural hair in the mornings.

2023 ALLURE Best of Beauty Award for Best Hair Pick
2020 ALLURE Best of Beauty Award for Best Hair Pick

products.title: Edge Tool
products.body_html: Become the master artist of sleek edges with our solid 3-in-1 Edge Tool, crafted with durable vegan bristles. Perfect your style with endless swoops & swirls effortlessly.

products.title: Curl Gel
products.body_html: Flexible & creamy gel that defines curls with a touchable medium hold that is crunch & flake-free. Crafted with Aloe Vera, Coconut Oil & Cacay Oil curls are left defined, springy, juicy & joyful.

products.title: Cleansing Shampoo
products.body_html: Provides the deep cleaning benefits of clarifying shampoo without stripping away healthy oils. Our shampoo is boosted by antioxidant-rich Matcha Green Tea, Aloe Vera & Panthenol which promotes strong hair, removes buildup & revives scalps.

products.title: Mini Stylers Bundle
products.body_html:
10% off when you buy these products together as a bundle!

Includes: Hydrating Mist 3 fl oz, Curl Gel 3 fl oz, Styling Cream 3 fl oz & Strong Hold Gel 3 oz

The Mini Stylers Bundle is the perfect little grouping to test & play with our latest formulas & get a sense for which stylers your pattern likes best. Deluxe-sized & ready for trial or travel, you'll receive all 4 formulas designed to define, hydrate & hold the beautiful plethora of hairstyles our textures can create from braids to bantu knots, wash-&-gos to locs. Bonus: each tube & jar is refillable for eco-conscious curlies!

products.title: On-the-Go Kit
products.body_html:
A $36 value 

Curl favorites in a convenient trial & travel kit.

Includes: Hydration Shampoo 3 fl oz, Heavy Conditioner 3 fl oz, Leave-In Conditioner 3 fl oz plus a bonus jelly cosmetic bag

The On-the-Go Kit is the perfect bag of treats if you're looking to try some new curly hair care products or hoping to bring moisture & definition back to your curls. Bonus: each tube is refillable for eco-conscious curlies!

products.title: Velvet Scrunchies For Thick Hair (3pcs)
products.body_html: Rich to the touch & XL in size, our Velvet Scrunchies for thick hair are the luxurious hair ties your natural hair has been dreaming of. Crafted with premium velvet material for gentle hold on delicate strands. Each our of hair scrunchies also feature an extra wide, super stretchy inner hair tie for strength & durability to help prevent hair breakage as you wrap your voluminous curls. A chic & simple curly hair accessory to top off any hairstyle.

products.title: Shipping Protection by Route
products.body_html:
Route provides protection for shipments that are lost, broken, or stolen. Add Route to your cart at checkout to enable protection.

Visit route.com to learn more.

products.title: Leave-In Conditioner
products.body_html:
Our #1 bestseller seals in moisture & adds extra hydration to wet or dry hair while providing double the curl definition & preventing unwanted frizz. Keep your inches with 2X less breakage thanks to our formula rich in Aloe, Honey & Jojoba Oil.

FREE GIFT! Purchase our full size 9.8 fl oz or our jumbo 25 fl oz and receive a free sample of our top-selling Detangling Nectar. Limited time only!

products.title: Shower Brush
products.body_html:
Heavyweight yet gentle on hair texture, our Shower Brush is like a magic wand for styling happy curls. Built with premium features like flexible bristles & a comfortable handle design. It serves as a detangling brush for curly hair & is the best tool for gently releasing each tangle & knot while helping tight curls clump & find each other to get great definition during your hair care routine.

2020 Glamour Beauty Award Winner for Best Hairbrush for Curls and Coils
2019 Very Good Light, Lightening Award Winner
2019 Gloss Angeles’ award in Best Hair Launches

products.title: Hair Clip
products.body_html:
Made of strong premium acetate, our Hair Clip for every curly hair type will soon become your favorite styling companion. Great for sectioning thick hair so you can cater to each curl one at a time, we're happy to provide an extra hand as you get your curls poppin'.

You can pair the clip with other natural hair accessories such as a hair tie, bobby pin, barrettes, & satin or velvet scrunchies.

products.title: Argan Oil Blend
products.body_html: Transform your hair with our lightweight, residue-free Argan Oil Blend. Enhanced with a powerful mix of oils including Argan, Sunflower, & Shea. It strengthens, hydrates, & keeps curls soft & smooth. Embrace healthier, more resilient curls today.

products.title: Jojoba Oil Blend
products.body_html: Help curls retain moisture, reduce breakage & ease an itchy or dry scalp with this lightweight & residue-free hair oil made with a blend of Safflower Oil, Rosehip Oil, Olive Oil & Lavender Oil & Jojoba Oil for hair.

products.title: Intensive Conditioner
products.body_html: Rich, ultra-hydrating conditioner that protects against breakage, dryness & helps restore curl patterns. Packed with Avocado Oil, Shea Butter & Safflower Oil, this powerhouse doubles as a deep conditioner.

products.title: Heavy Conditioner
products.body_html: Super rich & super thick conditioner that provides serious hydration for coils & tight textures. Avocado Oil, Shea Butter & Safflower Oil provide this formula with the signature “PATTERN slip” for easy detangling & great curl clumping.

products.title: Hydration Shampoo
products.body_html: Community favorite that gently cleanses & removes build-up without stripping away moisture. Packed with Shea Butter, Aloe Vera Leaf Juice, Honey & Coconut Oil this shampoo is perfect for all curl types & does not contain harsh surfactants such as SLS or SLES.
